p: The antibiotics and antifungals drugs (RA-rifampicin: 5 μg, DA-clindamycin: 2 μg, P-penicillin G: 10 IU, CLR-clarithromycin: 15 μg, AMX-amoxicillin: 25 μg, MTZ-metronidazole: 5 μg, OXA-oxacillin: 5 μg, TMP-trimethoprim: 5 μg, SXT-trimethoprim-sulfamethoxazole: 1.25 μg/23.75 μg VAN-vancomycin: 30 μg, AMB-amphotericin: B: 100 μg, FLC-fluconazole: 25 μg, and KTC-ketoconazole: 15 μg) were used as positive control. The logic of selection of these antibiotics was based on the antibiotic susceptibility testing.
